content: wwaaffflflee tthhee mmiinnii wwhhaallee by johannamigurumi abbreviations supplies magic_ring = magic_ring + medium weight chenille or velvet yarn i used bernat baby velvet in sky blue for single_crochet = single_crochet the head color and snowy white for the half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet belly color double_crochet = double_crochet + 10mm safety eyes increase = increase + 3 25mm crochet hook decrease = decrease invisible + scissors slip_stitch = slip_stitch + darning needle st = stitch + stitch marker * polyester fiberfill for stuffing chain = chain bob = bobble stitch flo = front loop only difficulty fo = fasten_off beginner skills required crocheting in a spiral magic_ring single_crochet double_crochet half double crochet bobble stitch slip_stitch increasing decreasing and chaining how to make a bobble stitch yarn over insert hook into stitch yarn over draw loop back through stitch yarn over pull through 2 loops repeat 4 more times until you have 6 loops on your hook yarn over and draw through all 6 loops to complete the bobble © 2024 johannamigurumi all rights reserved page 2 body start with head color 1 single_crochet 8 in a magic_ring 8 2 increase in each st around 16 3 single_crochet increase x 8 24 4 single_crochet in each st around 24 5 2 single_crochet increase x 8 32 6-9 single_crochet in each st around - 4 rounds 32 the next round will include the tail and fins note only the tail and fins are worked in the flo 10 slip_stitch in flo *chain 4 double_crochet in 3rd chain from the hook half_double_crochet in next slip_stitch in beginning st* repeat 6 single_crochet bob in flo 17 single_crochet bob in flo 6 single_crochet 32 change to belly color 11 blo 2 single_crochet decrease x 8 24 add eyes between rounds 8-9 with approximately 6 stitches showing between them they should be about 3 stitches away from the fin begin stuffing the body and continue to stuff until closed 12 single_crochet decrease x 8 16 13 decrease x 8 8 fo and weave in the end © 2024 johannamigurumi all rights reserved page 3 congratulations your waffle the mini whale is complete i hope that you enjoyed making it please share your creations and tag me on instagram @johannamigurumi i would love to see them to make waffle more chunky use 12mm eyes chunky chenille yarn and a 4 5mm crochet hook i used premier parfait chunky in peach and white copyright 2024 © johannamigurumi all rights reserved you are not allowed to sell this pattern you are not allowed to distribute translate or publish this pattern in any form you are not allowed to alter this pattern in any form you may sell finished products made with this pattern that are handmade by yourself but please provide credit in your listings to me as the designer @johannamigurumi if you have any questions please reach out contact info instagram -
